subject: Soccer
Ankles (Body Part)
lead_paragraph: Portugal wing Cristiano Ronaldo will probably miss the start of the season with Manchester United because of ankle surgery. He is scheduled to have surgery next week after playing with pain over the final two months of the English season and through the European Championship.
